name: Howards Mountain Lodge
description:
Howardâ€™s Mountain Lodge is the ultimate start for all outdoor adventure in Tongariro National Park, Ruapehu Ski fields and Whanganui National Park.

We have rooms for all budgets at the foothills of the breathtaking Tongariro National Park. Ask us about the Shuttles that pick up and drop off from our door.

The lodge offers a broad variety of accommodation ranging from budget rooms to ensuite rooms. Daily transport to the Tongariro Alpine Crossing and the 42 Traverse Mountain bike track, Rental of ski equipment, tramping boots and walking poles. Enjoy a fantastic summer experience or an exhilarating winter getaway; we have just what you need.

Two spacious kitchens or venture into the village.

Dry Rooms, BBQ, Pool Table and extensive DVD library awaits after your days activity. A short walk to the village restaurants and bars

houseRules.notes:
1. PAYMENT & IDENTIFICATION
A valid credit card is required to reserve all bookings and may be used as security against your stay in our accommodation and key bond. A valid International Passport and credit card is also required to validate your stay on arrival.  
2. CANCELLATIONS
Notice of cancellation is required no later than 1 day (24 hours) prior to check in date. If you do not notify in sufficient time a charge equal to the first night stay will still be payable. Should you wish to shorten a reservation after arrival the cost of the entire stay may still be payable. Charges are at the discretion of management. 
3. MINIMUM AGE LIMIT
Guest minimum age limit is 18 years if in shared dorm rooms. Children welcome in private rooms with parents or guardian. 
4. CHECK IN TIMES
Check in times are from 2:00pm and strictly no later than 9:30 pm. No check ins will be allowed after this time as the reception and hostel main doors will be closed. Failing to check in by 9:30pm will be considered a No Show and guest will be charged for the first night stay. We do not offer a 24- hour reception. 
5. KEY & HIRE/LOAN ITEMS
Should you not return your keys or hostel items before checking out or lose your keys, a minimum $50 fee per set will be payable /charged. 
6. OCCUPANCY TERMS
The number of guests occupied in the room shall not exceed the number of guests booked. Should we observe that this occupancy has been exceeded overnight, a $50 penalty will apply. We also reserve the right to terminate the reservation for any breaches at any time, without a refund. 
7. CHECK OUT TIMES
Check out times are no later than 10:00am to allow our cleaning team to start.
